Package tp_ed.capturetheflag.game

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
tp_ed.capturetheflag.game.GameMap
public class GameMap extends Object
The GameMap class represents the game map for the game. It handles the map's structure, including vertices and edges, and the visualization of the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(int numLocations, boolean isBidirectional, double density) throws EmptyCollectionException
      Constructs a new GameMap with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      numLocations - Number of locations in the map.
      isBidirectional - Whether the map's paths are bidirectional.
      density - Density of the paths in the map.
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - If the network cannot be created.

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(Network<Integer> importedNetwork)
      Constructs a GameMap based on an imported network.
      Parameters:
      importedNetwork - The network structure imported for the map.

      public void updateBotLocation(String playerIdentifier, int botNumber, int newLocation) throws ElementNotFoundException
      Updates the location of a bot on the map.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - Identifier of the player owning the bot.
      botNumber - The number of the bot.
      newLocation - The new location of the bot.
      Throws:
      ElementNotFoundException - If the bot is not found.
